title: MLB. TV Account - MLB.TV Sing Team
MLB. TV Account - MLB.TV T-Mobile Tuesday
Sign Out - .TV Page (Entitled User)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the user has an entitled account
AND the user has logged into MLB.tv
AND the user has started a stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks settings
AND the user clicks logout
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be logged out of MLB.com
AND the user will be redirected to https://www.mlb.com/logout

title: Sign Out - .TV Page (Free User)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the user has no entitlements
AND the user has logged into MLB.tv
AND the user has started a stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks settings
AND the user clicks logout
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be logged out of MLB.com
AND the user will be redirected to https://www.mlb.com/logout

title: Free User - Sign In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com Account
AND the user has logged into MLB.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to access a FGOTD (Free Game of the Day) stream
custom_expected: THEN the user will be able to start playback

title: Free User - Access
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the account isn't entitled
AND the user has logged into MLB.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to access a game outside of FGOTD
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be prevented from viewing the stream
AND the user will see a not entitled message.

title: Account Alerts - Set Up Accounts (Not Necessary for every single test run)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the users have their accounts created
AND the users have the correct accounts entitled
custom_steps: WHEN the user needs to create a media alert for a user
custom_expected:
THEN the user will send this request:

    POST /customer/{Customer's OKTA ID}/media-alerts?alertMessageKey={Alert Message Key}& expirationDate={Expiration Date of Alert}& priority= 
    HTTP/1.1
    Host: mlbmediaalertservices.commerce-qa.mlbinfra.com
    Content-Type: application/json
    cache-control: no-cache

to: https://mlbmediaalertservices.commerce-qa.mlbinfra.com/customer/00uhcr2hkmR1Chz0v0h7/media-alerts or https://mlbmediaalertservices.mlb.com/customer/00uhcr2hkmR1Chz0v0h7/media-alerts depending on the environment.
AND the user will check to see if the alert was properly applied by using this request:

    GET /customer/00uhcr2hkmR1Chz0v0h7/media-alerts?includeExpired=Yes HTTP/1.1
    Host: mlbmediaalertservices.commerce-qa.mlbinfra.com
    Content-Type: application/json
    cache-control: no-cache

to: https://mlbmediaalertservices.commerce-qa.mlbinfra.com/customer/00uhcr2hkmR1Chz0v0h7/media-alerts or https://mlbmediaalertservices.mlb.com/customer/00uhcr2hkmR1Chz0v0h7/media-alerts depending on the environment.

title: Account Alerts - MLB.TV Monthly Hard Fail (No Entitlement)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an account created on MLB.com
AND the user has MANUAL_MLBTV_AR_FAILURE_PR_MON attached to the account
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs into a MLB.tv Live or Archived Stream
custom_expected:
THEN the user shouldn't be able to access playback
AND the user should see the following message:
>We were unable to process the automatic renewal of your subscription with the credit or debit card currently associated with your account. To start your 2019 subscription >at the same low price as last year, please click the purchase button.

AND the user should see a purchase button that redirects user to https://commerce.mlb.com/purchase?mlbSku=1001107599999910251901000&campaign=mlbtv_monthly&redemptionCode=&flow=PURCHASE

title: Account Alerts - MLB.TV Monthly Soft Fail (No Entitlement)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an active MLB Account
AND the account has MANUAL_MLBTV_AR_FAILURE_SOFT_PR_MON attached to the account
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to a live or archived stream
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be unable to start playback
AND the user should see the following message appear:

>We were unable to process the automatic renewal of your subscription with the credit or debit card currently associated with your account. To start your 2019 subscription >at the same low price as last year, please click the subscribe button.

AND the user should see a Subscribe button that links to https://commerce.mlb.com/purchase?mlbSku=1001107599999910251901000&campaign=mlbtv_monthly&redemptionCode=&flow=PURCHASEâ€™style='color:#DD0000

title: Account Alerts - MLB.TV Yearly Hard Fail (No Entitlement)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB account
AND the account has MANUAL_MLBTV_AR_FAILURE_PR_SEA alert key attatched
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to an MLB.tv Live or Archived stream
custom_expected:
THEN users should be blocked from playback
AND the user should see the following message:

>We were unable to process the automatic renewal of your subscription with the credit or debit card currently associated with your account. To start your 2019 subscription, >please click the purchase subscribe.

AND the user should see a Purchase button that links to https://commerce.mlb.com/purchase?mlbSku=1001107599999910221901000&campaign=mlbtv&redemptionCode=&flow=PURCHASE

title: Account Alerts - MLB.TV Yearly Hard Fail (MLB.TV Yearly Entitlement)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an entitled MLB Account
AND the account has the following alert attached: MANUAL_MLBTV_AR_FAILURE_PR_SEA
custom_steps: WHEN users try to open a MLB.tv live or archived stream
custom_expected:
THEN users will be unable to start playback
AND the user will see the following message:

>We were unable to process the automatic renewal of your subscription with the credit or debit card currently associated with your account. To start your 2019 subscription, >please click the purchase subscribe.

AND the user will see the purchase button link to https://commerce.mlb.com/purchase?mlbSku=1001107599999910221901000&campaign=mlbtv&redemptionCode=&flow=PURCHASE

title: Account Alerts - MLB.TV Yearly Soft Fail (No Entitlement)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the account has the following media alert attached to it: MANUAL_MLBTV_AR_FAILURE_SOFT_PR_SEA
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to access a MLB.tv Stream
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the following message

>We were unable to process the automatic renewal of your subscription with the credit or debit card currently associated with your account. To start your 2019 subscription, >please click \"Subscribe\" to purchase.

AND the user will see a `Subscribe` button that will redirect users to https://commerce.mlb.com/purchase?mlbSku=1001107599999910221901000&campaign=mlbtv&redemptionCode=&flow=PURCHASE

title: Account Alerts - MLB.TV Yearly Soft Fail (MLB.TV Yearly Entitlement)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com account
AND the account is entitled with MLB.tv Yearly
AND the account has the following account alert attached to it: MANUAL_MLBTV_AR_FAILURE_SOFT_PR_SEA
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to access a MLB.tv Stream
custom_expected:
THEN users will be able to view the stream
AND the following message will appear

>We were unable to process the automatic renewal of your subscription with the credit or debit card currently associated with your account. To ensure uninterrupted access >to your subscription, please update your payment card(s) information in the Payment Profile section of your MLB.com account by clicking \"Update\".

AND the user will see an Update button that redirects users to: https://www.mlb.com/account/subscriptions/payments

title: Account Alerts - MLB.TV Single Team Hard Fail (No Entitlement)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a mlb.com account
AND the user has the following account alert attached to the account: MANUAL_MLBTV_AR_FAILURE_STP
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to access a stream on MLB.tv
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be unable to achieve playback
AND the user will see the following alert

>We were unable to process the automatic renewal of your subscription with the credit or debit card currently associated with your account. To start your 2019 subscription, >please select the single team package you want to purchase.

AND the user will see a select package button that redirects users to https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/subscribe?&affiliateId=MEDIAPLAYER

title: Account Alerts - MLB.TV Single Team Hard Fail (STP - Cubs)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a mlb.com account
AND the account is entitled with a MLB.tv single team entitlement
AND the user has the following account alert attached to the account: MANUAL_MLBTV_AR_FAILURE_STP
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to access a stream on MLB.tv
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be unable to achieve playback
AND the user will see the following alert

>We were unable to process the automatic renewal of your subscription with the credit or debit card currently associated with your account.  To start your 2019 subscription, please select the single team package you want to purchase.

AND the user will see a select package button that redirects users to https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/subscribe?&affiliateId=MEDIAPLAYER

title: Account Alerts - MLB.TV Single Team Soft Fail (No Entitlement)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a mlb.com account
AND the user has the following account alert attached to the account: MANUAL_MLBTV_AR_FAILURE_SOFT_STP
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to access a stream on MLB.tv
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be unable to achieve playback
AND the user will see the following alert

>We were unable to process the automatic renewal of your subscription with the credit or debit card currently associated with your account.  To start your 2019 subscription, please click the subscribe button and select the single team package you want to purchase.

AND the user will see a Subscribe button that redirects users to https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/subscribe?&affiliateId=MEDIAPLAYER

title: Account Alerts - MLB.TV Single Team Soft Fail (STP - Cubs)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a mlb.com account
AND the account has a MLB.tv single team entitlement
AND the user has the following account alert attached to the account: MANUAL_MLBTV_AR_FAILURE_SOFT_STP
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to access a stream on MLB.tv
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to achieve playback
AND the user will see the following alert

>We were unable to process the automatic renewal of your subscription with the credit or debit card currently associated with your account.  To start your 2019 subscription, please click the subscribe button and select the single team package you want to purchase.

AND the user will see a Subscribe button that redirects users to https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/subscribe?&affiliateId=MEDIAPLAYER

title: Account Alerts - MLB.TV No Entitlement Accounts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a mlb.com account
AND the account has no entitlement
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to access a stream on MLB.tv
custom_expected:
THEN users will be unable to achieve playback
AND the user will see the following message

>The account you're using is not entitled to view this content. Please select "Subscribe" to subscribe or upgrade your account.

AND the user will see a Subscribe button that redirects to `https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/subscribe`

title: MLB.tv Alerts - Auto Play Blocked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the account has an MLBALL entitlement
AND the user is blocking autoplay from the browser
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks play on the live stream or archived stream
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a toaster message appear: 
"Your browser blocks auto-playing videos. Please click "Learn More" to learn how to enable auto-play for MLB.TV."
AND the user will see a Learn More button that takes the user to http://mlb.mlb.com/mlbtv/help-center/desktop-faq.jsp

title: MLB.tv Alerts - Youtube Game of the Week
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the account has an MLBALL entitlement
AND the user is blocking autoplay from the browser
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks play on a Youtube Game of the Week live stream
AND the user clicks on the link in the modal
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a modal popup
AND the user will see the following title: "Live on YouTube - Watch Free"
AND the user will see the following subtitle: This exclusive MLB broadcast is available for FREE in HD on YouTube. Please download the YouTube TV app to your device or visit youtube.com/mlb on your web or mobile browser to watch the game."
AND the user will see the button which links the user to the game on Youtube.

title: MLB.tv Alerts - Black Out Exception
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the account has an MLBALL entitlement
AND the user is in a blacked out area code for the game
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks play on the live stream or archived stream
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be unable to start/resume playback, only audio/radio broadcast
AND the user will see a modal
AND the modal will display the following title, subtitle, and description:
`title: "Broadcast Blacked Out",
subtitle: "We have determined this game is unavailable in your area",
description: "During the MLB Regular Season and Postseason, live games may be blacked out due to Major League Baseball exclusivities. Live Audio of this game is available as part of your MLB.TV subscription, and an 
archive copy of the game will be available 90 minutes after the game ends."`

AND the user will see a link that sends users to `https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/subscribe#blackout`

title: MLB.tv Alerts - Not Entitled Exception
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com account
AND the user doesn't have an entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to a live stream OR archive stream
AND the user clicks play
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be unable to start playback
AND the user will see a toaster message that displays: `The account you're using is not entitled to view this content. Please select "Subscribe" to subscribe or upgrade your account.`
AND the user will see a button that sends the user to `https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/subscribe`

title: MLB.tv Alerts - Concurrent Stream Violations
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has 5 valid MLB.tv accounts
AND all 5 of the accounts have entitlements
AND the user has 5 different devices/browsers
custom_steps:
WHEN the user logs onto 4 devices/browsers within four minutes
AND the user starts a stream on each of the 4 devices/browsers
AND the user waits 2 minutes before logging onto the 5th device
AND the user starts a stream on the 5th device
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be unable to retrieve playback
AND the user will see a toaster message: `"Your account is currently in use at another location. Reset your password by logging in to MLB.com, and click on the profile icon to change your password."`
AND the button will send the user to `https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/help-center/accounts`
